name: Moon-userbot
description: A Simple, Fast, Customizable, Ai powered Userbot for Telegram with most easiest installation.

PM_LIMIT.description: set your pm permit warn limit, default is 4

SECOND_SESSION.description: Pyrorogram v2 session string for music bot, only fill this if you want to use music bot feature

DATABASE_URL.description: ONLY for MongoDB, get it from https://cloud.mongodb.com

DATABASE_NAME.description: set database name, if using sqlite then change it to `db.sqlite3`

DATABASE_TYPE.description: set to sqlite3 if want to use sqlite3 db

STRINGSESSION.description: Pyrogram V2 Session String. Don't use bots or else you'll be responsible for your actions. Gen yourself https://github.com/The-MoonTg-project/Moon-Userbot?tab=readme-ov-file#-optional-vars.

APIFLASH_KEY.description: ONLY, If you want to use web screenshot plugin You can get it from https://apiflash.com/dashboard/access_keys

RMBG_KEY.description: ONLY, If you want to use removbg plugin You can get it from https://www.remove.bg/dashboard#api-key

VT_KEY.description: ONLY, If you want to use VirusTotal plugin You can get it from https://www.virustotal.com/gui/

GEMINI_KEY.description: ONLY, If you want to use gemini ai plugin You can get it from https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey

COHERE_KEY.description: ONLY, If you want to use cohere ai plugin You can get it from https://dashboard.cohere.com/api-keys
